dct_title_s: A new and correct chart shewing the variations of the compass in the western & southern oceans as observed in ye year 1700 by his Maties. command
dct_description_sm: Shows North and South Atlantic Oceans, South America, West Indies, portions of Central America, North America, Europe, and Africa. Includes text and ill.; shows track of Halley's ship, the Paramore. An unrecorded edition which may fall between the proof state and state 1 of the map. cf Barry Lawrence Ruderman Antique Maps Inc. (www.RareMaps.com).
